text: CLOSE Kathy Griffin is ready to laugh about the time a photo got her in hot water with the feds and the president. This summer she plans to tour North America, including a sold - out gig at Carnegie Hall in New York. ( April 2 ) AP Kathy Griffin performs during her Laugh Your Head Off Tour on July 19 in Hollywood. ( Photo : Allen Berezovsky, Getty Images ) HOLLYWOOD – Kathy Griffin is back on U. S. soil, and she ’ s got a lot of material to get off her chest. The comedian brought her Laugh Your Head Off World Tour to Hollywood Thursday night, serving up almost three hours of comedy in a high - octane set.
